Explore an all new Nether loaded with new features! Complete portals in the overworld to venture into the Nether. 
There are new biomes, new mobs, dangerous Bastion structures, respawn anchors, new blocks, new ores, and much more!

There's also loads of goodies for you on our instagram channel. We're giving away artist-created coloring pages, skill-boosting live streams, and entries for the 2020 Art Prize open May 20!

data.name: Plague Inc.
data.description:
最新版本:  1.17.4
更新时间:  2020-02-27 01:34:57 (北京时间)

Mutation 17 - The Fake News update

From wild conspiracy theories to election campaign mudslinging, we now live in a post-fact world where falsehoods and misinformation can spread just like a disease.

With help from professional fact checking organisations like ‘Full Fact’ in the UK and ‘Politifact’ in the USA - we’ve designed a radically different scenario which lets you create your very own Fake News story and deceive the world with it.

Choose your type of misinformation, decide a motive and then select who started it and who gets the blame then use a variety of modern tools and psychological tricks to go viral!

Check out www.fullfact.org and www.politifact.com to find and expose bad information.

Hotfix 1.17.2 - Localised the Fake News government actions and fixed a few bugs
Hotfix 1.17.3 - Fixed pie chart image and rare crash in Portuguese
Hotfix 1.17.4 - Small core simulation tweaks

data.name: Geometry Dash
data.description:
最新版本:  2.11
更新时间:  2017-11-17 02:43:46 (北京时间)

Update 2.1.1 is here!

This update will function like a smaller "pre-update" before Update 2.2. Lots of fun stuff planned :)

- iPhone X support!
- New icons and effects!
- New community shop!
- Weekly Demon challenge!
- Folders and level sorting!
- New demon chests!
- Level leaderboards!
- Random other fun stuff.
- Lots of bugfixes and tweaks.

- There was an item duplication bug in version 2.1 that gave users extra rewards. This has been fixed in 2.11 and those rewards have been removed. So if you lose shards/diamonds etc after loading 2.11 its because they were bugged. Sorry :/

/RubRub

data.description:
最新版本:  6.4.0
更新时间:  2020-05-29 05:04:05 (北京时间)

Welcome to AutoSleep 6.4!
- New charge reminder. Get a reminder of your Watch battery level and whether you should charge it before going to bed. 
- New Smart Alarm (WatchOS 6 or higher). Start the day feeling less groggy with the new native Apple Watch smart alarm that can wake you up in lighter sleep or gently tap you to take you out of deeper sleep. 
- New Infograph large modular and large modular complication with alarm status and live sleep tracking. 
- Watch app support for older watches running WatchOS 4.
- Various fixes and general tidying up. 
- Learn more in the app in Settings / What's New.

The Bloons are not messing around on this one! A map so tough, so brutal, it can only be called EXTREME! For the first time ever, we're adding an all new Extreme difficulty map: Toxic Waste. Four incredibly short paths that only the most skilled monkeys will be able to defend. Luckily, it takes more than some off-color water to scare your subs and buccaneers. And lets face it, you're going to need all the help you can get!

data.name: My Macros+ | Diet & Calories
data.description:
最新版本:  2020.17
更新时间:  2020-06-22 05:40:07 (北京时间)

Thank you very much for your continued support! We're here with another great update.

Dynamic Font Sizes!
• Do you have your accessibility settings set to use a larger font size ?
If so, My Macros+ will now up the font size in the app as well to match.

Also just a reminder in the last update we: 

Context menus!
• Press and hold on a meal you’ve tracked to view the same meal options you previously had to ‘slide out’ to see, but now as a pop up.
• Press and hold on a meal you’ve tracked on a previous day for an even quicker way to copy it to todays date

In this update we vastly improved external keyboard and trackpad support on iOS 13.4.
• Hold the cmd key on your iPads keyboard to see all the quick actions you can perform without your hands leaving the keys

最新版本:  7.6.1
更新时间:  2020-06-25 16:17:30 (北京时间)

Hello folks! The word of the day for today’s update is _stability_.
From unexpected behaviors to crashes on specific images with shadows, we’ve slain a large number of bugs that should result in a more stable, more predictable Scanner Pro for everyone. 
Thank you for the feedback and the feature requests, we always love hearing what we can do to make Scanner Pro better. 

If you need us you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com
Just pop on over to our Support Team and we'll point you in the right direction.

data.description:
最新版本:  1.5.0
更新时间:  2020-06-03 15:49:12 (北京时间)

New Difficulty: Mega-Brutal - For those that think Brutal is Casual, we’ve added an entirely new difficulty to sink your teeth into. 

Mega-Brutal adds new local concerns around road quality and security, lets insurgents lash out in desperation and adds depth to peace negotiations.
 
As for the future, we’ve got new modes, maps, governors and more still to come. Let us know what you would most like to see!

data.name: Skater - Skate Legendary Spots
data.description:
最新版本:  1.6.11
更新时间:  2018-03-30 00:26:47 (北京时间)

Questions or feedback? Hit us up on support@skaterapp.com.

1.6.11 - Minor Update
- New game server system implemented in run browser for speed and stability
- KTPlay community section removed due to focus on core features
- Minor bug fixes

1.6.10 - Minor Update
- Trick Book changed to Tips and Tricks section with videos demonstrating all tricks
- Tips and demo videos available at key points in tutorial and through first level unlock
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

1.6.5 - Minor Update
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

Previous updates:

1.6.4 - Minor Update
- Fix for server connection and loading issues
- Fix for LES lighting

1.6.2 - KTPlay Community Section and New Baker Decks!

- KTPlay community system
- New Baker decks, Stacked Floral Blue and Logo Splatter

1.6.0 - Major Update

- L.E.S. Coleman skatepark NYC
- New deck: Revive Tie Die logo deck, Force Comic Ledge 52mm wheels, Amgrip Revive Collab grip and Orion Super Death trucks
- Various bug fixes

1.5.3 - Minor Update

- Two new decks - Revive + Force Wheels + Amgrip
- Game Centre Achievements now included and accessible through the Player menu
- Fix for crash caused by video recording issue
- Fix for crash when loading broken runs or re-loading levels with broken runs in them

1.5.2 - Bug Fix Update

Fixes:
- Fix some loading screen crashes
- Fix some gameplay crashes related to video recording
- Fix for crash and issues when loading corrupted gear data
- User feedback flow simplified

1.5.1 - Minor Update

Fixes:
- Fix blue screen issue in gameplay
- Fix work-around for Game Centre login issues
- Fix menu open getting stuck and run saving issues

1.5.0 - Minor Update

Changes:
- New DC's x2!! The new Trase S SE Tristan in a slick White / Green colorway and new Lynx Vulc S Cyril Jackson in a hella cool Black / Red. Seriously loving these new kicks =]...
- Removed several causes of lag and jitter in gameplay. Feeling very buttery on older devices like iPad Mini 1!
- Small fixes to faulty / missing textures and carlsbad level select graphic
- Improved sensitivities and settings for many of the game controls (shuv, flip, steering, push and more)
- Improved processing of touch inputs and consistency of control feel across different device models and types
- Flip is now controlled by swipe speed instead of swipe distance

Fixes:
- Fix for frozen Game Centre / stuck on loading screen issue
- Fix for run refresh getting stuck after first refresh
- Fix for trick icons in replay browser
- Fix drifting foot when spinning out of grinds
- Fix for crashes caused by device running out of disk space

1.4.9 - Minor Update

- New hand-crafted “Spot Challenge” runs made by the Skater team which will appear in the run browser feed until you’ve ‘completed’ a level and unlocked the next one
- Main menu button moved to absolute edge of screen to reduce accidental pressing
- “Challenges” page now called “Trick Book”
- Fix crashes related to running out of hard disk space
- Fix crash / stuck on startup affecting some players
- Fix occasional losing level and gear unlocks
- Fix buggy position of body rotation slider on iPads

1.4.8 - Minor Update

- Music button moved to main menu
- Main menu button moved to top of screen to avoid accidental press during play
- Music volume fixed for use with Music and other apps like Spotify. Distorted game sounds also fixed
- One infrequent crashing bug fixed

data.name: Streaks
data.description:
最新版本:  5.3.5
更新时间:  2020-06-17 11:12:37 (北京时间)

Streaks 5.3.5:

* Fixed: Issue where mini-calendar may appear invisible
* Fixed: Minor bug with selecting day frequencies
* Added: soda / no soda icon

Streaks 5.3:

* Added: Ability to archive/restore tasks (see below)
* Added: App settings now sync across devices, including themes
* Added: Task notifications now sync across devices
* Added: Ukulele icon
* Added: Ability to use fractions of KM/Miles in Walk/Run task

ARCHIVED TASKS

You can archive any task to temporarily remove it from the app.

You can restore the task using the regular "add task" option. The history will be restored, and any days since you archived it will be marked as skipped.


If you have any feedback or suggestions, please contact us at support@streaks.app.

data.name: PLANBELLA - Planner App
data.description:
最新版本:  1.5.
更新时间:  2020-03-13 17:54:57 (北京时间)

Thank you for using the PLANBELLA planner app.

This update provides some new features that our users have requested:

- 12 am / pm or 24:00 time system
- Week starts on Monday or Sunday

Both functions can be managed in the settings area of the app.

If you have any problems or suggestions, please contact support@planbella.com.

v6.10.9 of FiLMiC Pro includes numerous bug fixes and performance enhancements for a better shooting experience:

- Zoom quality loss indicator restored to zoom rocker.
- Resolves an issue where the preview could become choppy after rotating the device with a high speed framerate selected.
- Improved handling of external audio devices.

If you have any questions, suggestions or findings please contact us at support@filmicpro.com
